issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding Affordable Care Act, protecting pre-existing condition coverage, and lowering prescription drug prices

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Advocates for green energy investments, reducing carbon emissions, and supporting renewable infrastructure

issues.title: Reproductive Rights
issues.description: Strong pro-choice stance, supports protecting abortion access and women's healthcare rights

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Supports increased federal education funding, student debt relief, and expanding public education resources

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, pathway to citizenship, and protecting DACA recipients

issues.title: Gun Safety Legislation
issues.description: Advocates for universal background checks, assault weapon restrictions, and comprehensive gun control measures

issues.title: Economic Equity
issues.description: Supports raising minimum wage, protecting workers' rights, and reducing income inequality
